content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=10.5, y=10.5), a boiler at position(x=-6.0, y=24.5), and an offshore pump at position(x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into labs
-  Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into labs.

### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure the entities are close enough to each other before attempting to connect them.
-  Ensure the connection points of the entities are not occupied by other entities.

### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure the required technologies are available for research before attempting to set them.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting to insert it.
-  Ensure the entity is not already full before attempting to insert items into it.
